description:
Tea Stem
Mom`s assistant Ai is mad over marriage. But it doesn`t go well, and she can`t even manage a marriage interview. And because of that, she`s on edge. Mom tries to encourage her, but...
Photographer
Bunji takes out Dad`s work tool, his camera. With his best friends, Ma, Chi and Daichi, he heads off to the streets to take interesting photos.
Between Men
Mr. Mizunuma, who works in a major publishing company and is in charge of Mom`s publishing, heads home early one evening. Thinking that he`ll get home early, he hurries back, but he gets called by Dad, saying that they should drink together, and...
Treasure Shop
Targeting the special Hopperman card that came in this month`s magazine supplement, Bunji and Dad go around to the neighborhood`s bookstores looking for it. But they can`t find it in any stores. Perplexed, they walk into this shop with a sign that says "Treasure Shop"...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tea Stem / Photographer / Between Men / Treasure Shop
茶柱 / カメラマン / 男どうし / お宝ショップ
